Name: Boss suit
Flavor: Show them who wears the pinstripes around here.
Effect: Reveal when a player attempts to queue into your room. Ignore the queue and return the room envelope to the room deck.

Name: Cat burglar outfit
Flavor: Always smart to dress like a criminal.
Effect: Reveal during your turn to steal a revealed reward card from another player. Keep it face-down. You may reveal it again in the future.

Name: Janitor's uniform
Effect: Reveal on your turn. Going forward, every time you clean a mess card, tuck it face-down under this card. For each card you tuck, this card gains +1 points.

Name: Lucky socks
Flavor: Luck is what happens when wealth meets nepotism.
Effect: Reveal when another player attempts to queue into your room, but their queue card does not match the room you are in. This card is then worth 5 points. If this never happens, this card is worth 0 points.

Name: Librarian sweater
Flavor: Dress for the job you want.
Effect: Reveal at the end of the game. Open the Study envelope. If it contains at least one positive mess card, this card is worth 4 points. Otherwise, it's worth 0 points.

Name: Monocle
Flavor: Show them who wears the pinstripes around here.
Effect: Reveal after leaving a room. Look at the room deck. You may open one envelope and read the cards inside. Put them back in the envelope and return it to the room deck.

Name: Parachute pants
Flavor: Looking great is its own reward.

Name: Rollerskates
Effect: Reveal after leaving a room. Look at the room deck. You may immediately move into one of those rooms, or return them and stay in the Hallway.

Name: White linen suit
Flavor: Spotless, and soft to the touch. Quite dashing.
Effect: Reveal at the end of the game. If you have 0 face-up mess cards, this card is worth 4 points. Otherwise, it's worth 0 points.
